name: Ext_R2_Conformance_re_re_se_definition
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.Conformance.rest.resource.searchParam.definition for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Conformance.rest.resource.searchParam.definition from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Conformance|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: An absolute URI that is a formal reference to where this parameter was first defined, so that a client can be confident of the meaning of the search parameter (a reference to [SearchParameter.url](https://hl7.org/fhir/DSTU2/SearchParameter.url.html)).
element.comment: `CapabilityStatement.rest.resource.searchParam.definition` maps to R4B `CapabilityStatement.rest.resource.searchParam.definition`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
